original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, posts as p, users as u WHERE p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-21 05:30:40' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.Score>=0 AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.UpVotes<=198 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 20:49:05' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-21 05:30:40'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation >= 1 AND users.UpVotes <= 198 AND users.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 20:49:05'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2.UserId=E3.Id)
